Section.Catchline: Local government information to be sent to the department.

SectionBody.Text: Each county shall transmit the following information to the department, according to guidelines established under s. 403.7226:

Subsection.Text: A summary of the information gathered during its local hazardous waste management assessment;
Information gathered from each small quantity generator not notified or verified previously; and
Onsite information gathered from each existing small quantity generator verification.
